ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Hail to the quiet list...hehe
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail brother of the dark I was once also considered with apprehension, but my tireless would slaying Sanark Berzerkser, collecting their war braids in good
ygData.messageBody:
Hail brother of the dark
 
I was once also considered with apprehension, but my tireless would slaying Sanark Berzerkser, collecting their war braids in good numbers.  It would be then that I would head back to our outpost to hand them to the captain of the guard to prove my worth to the people who inhabit this desolate place.
 
 
or........
as Allakhazam's might have put it ......
Protect the Shipyard:  Hail Captain Rottgrime and he says that "we [shall not allow those sarnak to overtake the Danak Shipyards].  Is that clear marine?!!"   He wants you to kill the Sarnak Berzerkers and return their war braids.  For every fourth, you shall earn your ages.  Hand him 4 war braids and he will say "Great job marine!! Word of your heroics shall be passed on to the Admiral.  If you don't have a shield then take one, if you do then get back to the frontlines.  There is no time for R n' R!!  Move it marine!!  Or you'll be pushing Danak till the cockatrice crow!!"  Your faction standing with VenrilSathir gets better and you gain decent xp, gold and a guard of the marines.
 
 
 
 
also.........
i hunted in overthere from 34 till 39, would still be there if i didnt want to kill some hill gaints for some cash.
Soloing is easy, dooming darkness your selected enemy back to your pet, send in the bonie destroyer,  invoke fear them, apply some of the venom of the snake, keep fear and dooming up and yee shall level faster than it takes to push Danak till the cockatrice crow.
 
 
 
Evilly Regarded As
Darkivez (39th necro)
Psycotic (50th druid)
 - Quellious (Wings of Wrath)
----- Original Message -----
From: Will
To: EQ_Necromancer@egroups.com
Sent: Saturday, June 17, 2000 3:44 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Hail to the quiet list...hehe

Hey All masters of the dead,
 
    Anyone with Kunark know how to raise the faction for the outpost in THE OVERTHERE?  I am a darkie necro who is apprehensive and cannot do the sarnak war braid quest even in COB form...  I would very much like to be at least amiable if not warm over there...Thanks for any insight..
 
Maime Shadowhand, still freakin 35
Seekers of Lore, The Rathe
 
 
-- Death is the only way out!
This list is basically unmoderated.  However abusive language will not be tolerated
